call_title: Ergo PoW Blockchain - Weekly Update & AMA - April 3rd

decisions.decision: Sigmanauts mining pool will not open source the demurrage collection steps immediately and will keep it as competitive advantage
decisions.speaker: Marc the Shark
decisions.context: To maintain marketable advantage over other pools
decisions.quote: we're not going to explicitly give you guys the steps, I suppose, at least for the time being. So we're going to continue to build what they call the moat between us and other pools

decisions.decision: The demurrage open sourcing decision will be put to a vote among mining pool participants
decisions.speaker: Marc the Shark
decisions.context: To get community input on whether to keep the competitive advantage
decisions.quote: We are going to put it to a vote

commitments.commitment: Update Sigmanauts mining pool website with new polished UI/UX
commitments.quote: So hopefully within a couple weeks we'll have that up and running and ready to go

commitments.commitment: Reach out to YouTube miners for peer-to-peer podcast appearances
commitments.quote: Going to reach out to a couple other YouTube miners, see if we can get them on the peer-to-peer podcast

commitments.commitment: Start working with mining pools on getting activation and setting activation date for 6.0
commitments.quote: we will start working with the mining pools on getting activation, setting activation date and informing mining pools about the upcoming votes for protocol update

commitments.commitment: Invite one or two people to participate in testing devnet with peer-to-peer layer for sub-blocks
commitments.quote: in a few days we'll invite maybe one or two folks to participate testing devnet now with some peer-to-peer layer
So hopefully it will be released next week
hopefully within this next week, we'll get something out to you guys

commitments.commitment: kushti will check the Hydra paper for potential podcast discussion on off-chain systems
commitments.quote: So I can check the Hydra paper and we can have a talk about different off-chain systems
